author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و از نسمات جود آن سلطان وجود ارض ظاهره هم تبديل يافته لَو اَنتُم فی اَسرارِ الظُّهور تَتَفَکَّروُن.
translation: The breeze of the bounty of the King of creation hath caused even the physical earth to be changed, were ye to ponder in your hearts the mysteries of divine Revelation.
